Hello!
 I'm MatWorld! My channel differs from similar ones in that I create videos with a special approach: first I use Adobe Animate to create animations, and then I add unique sound and video effects in Adobe Premier Pro. I also use free images from google against the background of my locations in the video.🔥

All my videos contain materials protected by the fair use rules of Section 107 of the Copyright Act. It takes about 10-15 hours to create these videos so that my viewers can feel the difference between the original video and the video I created.

The audio and video sources in this video are created in such a way that the viewer can hear and see new UNIQUE content.
